sections.heading: Exemption
sections.text: 322.015 Exemption.—This chapter does not apply when a fully autonomous vehicle is operated with the automated driving system engaged and without a human operator.

sections.heading: Supersedeas
sections.text: 322.272 Supersedeas.—The filing of a petition for certiorari to the circuit court does not itself stay the enforcement of the suspension, revocation, or cancellation of license. The department may order a stay of enforcement upon appropriate terms and conditions.

sections.heading: Penalty
sections.text: 322.273 Penalty.—The penalty for violation of the terms or conditions of a license so restricted by the department shall be the same as the penalty for driving while such license is revoked, canceled or suspended.
